body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, my name is Bryan Turner and I work for Serene Stay Hotels. Can I get your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Bryan, my name is Judy James.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Judy. Could you please tell me your room number and how many nights you've stayed with us so far?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm in room two one zero and I've stayed for three nights.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Judy. One more question, what is your date of birth and your phone number to verify your account?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My date of birth is on the seventh of April, nine four eight seven, and my phone number is five five five, four three two, one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information, Judy. We will look into the issue you've raised about the bad smell in your room. I appreciate your patience and understanding.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I hope it gets resolved quickly. I'm feeling angry about the situation.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: We will do our best to address it promptly, Judy. Thank you for bringing it to our attention. If you need any further assistance, feel free to contact me. Have a pleasant day!
